AddOnStorageValue.Name: Caldera Forms_Multiple Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)
AddOnStorageValue.Value: { "Id": "0318f906-fd81-42f3-bb24-22534ac35669", "Application": "Caldera Forms", "AffectedVersions": [ "<1.6.0" ], "VulnerabilityName": "Multiple Cross-Site Scripting (XSS)", "ExternalReferer": "WPVDB-ID-9069, CVE-2018-7747", "Impact": "Medium", "Note": "Multiple cross-site scripting vulnerabilities in the Caldera Forms plugin before 1.6.0 for WordPress allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving, a greeting message, the email transaction log or an imported form." }
